snippet: Mr. Bates commandeered a former British military outpost in the North Sea in 1966 and declared a sovereign nation that his family still lays claim to.
abstract: Roy Bates, who commandeered former British military outpost in the North Sea in 1966 and declared it a sovereign nation, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bates commandeered a former British military outpost in the North Sea in 1966 and declared a sovereign nation that his family still lays claim to.

headline.seo: Roy Bates, Founder of Sealand, Dies at 91
headline.main: Roy Bates, Bigger-Than-Life Founder of a Micronation, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: Roy Bates, 91, Bigger-Than-Life Founder of a Micronation
